skills.name: Honorable Attack
skills.description: Charges to attack and stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 20% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Declare War
skills.description: Recovers your HP by 25% and provokes the enemy for 1 turn with a 75% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +10%
Recovery +10%
Recovery +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.25*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Undefeated Warrior
skills.description: Jumps into enemy territory to attack an enemy. You sequentially attack all enemies and decrease their Defense for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target
